Class EmailServiceTest

java.lang.Object
EmailServiceTest
class EmailServiceTest extends Object
Unit tests for the EmailService class.

This class verifies the functionality of the EmailService, including:

  • Successful email transmission.
  • Error handling when transmission fails.
  • Input validation for senders and recipients.
  • Authentication object creation.
  • Delegation of reminder emails.
Uses Mockito to mock static Transport calls to avoid sending real emails during testing.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Zainab

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    EmailServiceTest()
     

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    (package private) void
    testCreatePasswordAuthentication()
    Verifies that EmailService.createPasswordAuthentication() correctly returns an object containing the credentials provided in the constructor.
    (package private) void
    testSendEmail_InvalidRecipient_DoesNotSend()
    Verifies that EmailService.sendEmail(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String) aborts the operation safely (does not attempt to send) if the recipient address is null or empty.
    (package private) void
    testSendEmail_InvalidSender_ThrowsException()
    Verifies that EmailService.sendEmail(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String) throws an IllegalStateException if the service is initialized with an empty or null username (sender).
    (package private) void
    testSendEmail_Success()
    Verifies that EmailService.sendEmail(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String) successfully invokes the underlying Transport.send method when inputs are valid.
    (package private) void
    testSendEmail_TransportFailure_ThrowsRuntimeException()
    Verifies that EmailService.sendEmail(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String) wraps a MessagingException into a RuntimeException when the transport layer fails.
    (package private) void
    testSendReminder_DelegatesToSendEmail()
    Verifies that EmailService.sendReminder(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String) correctly delegates the call to EmailService.sendEmail(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String).

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
